content: **bambi cardigan** is a raglan-sleeve cardigan worked flat top-down and completely seamless you can knit it in one solid color or with two-row stripes always changing color on the same side i suggest knitting the neckband hem buttonband and sleeve cuffs in a single color the body is worked flat and the sleeves are worked in the round you can use short circular needles double-pointed needles or the magic loop technique to knit small circumferences for the raglan increases right-leaning and left-leaning increases are suggested but you can use any other simpler increase you prefer such as yarn-overs or twisted yarn-overs **about this pattern** sizes new born 0-6 months 6-12 months 1-2 years 2-4 years **finished garment measurements ** 44 5 53 5 59 66 5 70 cm / 17 75 21 5 23 5 26 5 28 approx chest circumference **recommended ease ** 2 6 cm / 0 75 2 5 of positive ease approx **how to choose the size ** choose according to the child s actual chest measurement not their age the age ranges are given only as a reference **gauge ** 22 sts x 30 row = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 in stockinette stitch after blocking **suggested needles** main fabric 3 5 mm circular needles / 80 cm us 4 /
